<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/workspaces/{slug}/issues/{project_identifier}-{issue_identifier}/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve a specific work item using workspace slug, project identifier, and issue identifier.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"issue_identifier","schema":{"type":"integer"},"description":"Issue sequence ID (numeric identifier within project)","required":true,"examples":{"ExampleIssueIdentifier":{"value":123,"summary":"Example issue identifier","description":"A typical issue sequence ID"}}},{"in":"path","name":"project_identifier","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Project identifier (unique string within workspace)","required":true,"examples":{"ExampleProjectIdentifier":{"value":"PROJ","summary":"Example project identifier","description":"A typical project identifier"}}},{"in":"path","name":"slug","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Workspace slug","required":true,"examples":{"ExampleWorkspace":{"value":"my-workspace","summary":"Example workspace","description":"A typical workspace slug"}}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
